main event: Multiple UFO sightings occurred in Knoxville, Tennessee in November 1954, involving reports of silver objects, a basketball-sized brilliant white light, and a circular object 30-40 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The sightings involved multiple objects, with reports of two silver objects and one basketball-sized white light.
The circular object observed was reported to be 30-40 feet in diameter, moving in a straight line at high speed before hovering and then accelerating and disappearing.
The estimated speed of the brilliant white light was 600-800 miles per hour, and it maintained constant brightness and elevation.
The investigating authority of one sighting initially attributed the objects to aircraft, while another cited insufficient data for evaluation.
The sightings were witnessed by multiple reliable sources, including civilians and were reported to the local Air Force Base and Air Technical Intelligence Center.
sighted object: multiple silver objects, a brilliant white light, and a circular object
